lead_paragraph: VICHY, France, July 2 -- Although Syria remains a minor theatre of operations, a new development there may increase its importance in the near future. The British have sent a strong motorized force from Iraq along the caravan trail that follows the course of the Euphrates in the general direction of Aleppo.
abstract: Brit send new column toward Aleppo

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
